name: briarbnb
description: [Briarbnb](https://briarbnb.onrender.com) is a clone of Airbnb. Users can create their own spots that others can book and review. They can also add images of the spots. Users can book any spot as long as it doesn't belong to them and they don't book on a date another user has booked. With the reviews you can leave your feelings and ratings while also providing images for clarity.

scripts.install: npm --prefix backend install backend && npm --prefix frontend install frontend
